overview: In Buckleroos Part 1, follow Dean Phoenix as Kick, and Marcus Iron as Jed, as they travel through their own discoveries of friendship, hot man-on-man sex, and true love. This two-part western epic takes place around the historical Colt belt buckle and the magic of the Man in Black, played by superstar Zak Spears in his first non-sexual role.
title: BuckleRoos
